SET(NAME dlfcn)

EXTERNALPROJECT_ADD(${NAME}
    URL https://github.com/${NAME}-win32/${NAME}-win32/archive/master.zip TIMEOUT 180
    INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/local

               -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF

               -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<INSTALL_DIR>
)
